content.description: <math alttext="The figure shows a 4 column table with 2 rows of data. The heading for column 1 is x. The heading for column 2 is f of x. The heading for column 3 is f prime of x. The heading for column 4 is f double prime of x. The data in the table are as follows. Row 1. x is 2; f of x is negative 2; f prime of x is 1; f double prime of x is 3. Row 2. x is 7; f of x is 4; f prime of x is 5; f double prime of x is 2." display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtable columnlines="solid solid solid none" equalcolumns="true" equalrows="true" frame="solid" rowlines="solid solid none"><mtr><mtd><mi>x</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>f</mi><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mi>x</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>f</mi><mo>′</mo></msup><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mi>x</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></mtd><mtd><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>′</mo><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>7</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>5</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></math>
content.question: The table shown gives selected values of a twice-differentiable function <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and its first two derivatives. What is the value of <math alttext="the integral from 2 to 7, of, f prime of t, d t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> ?
